participant_1.name: Nick
participant_1.personality: Shy and reserved, but has a hidden adventurous side that enjoys new experiences.
participant_1.background: I like to keep my home clean and tidy, but I also have a wild side and enjoy trying new things like auditioning for a talent show. I listen to classical music and I am very shy. I am going to be the starting shortstop.

participant_2.name: Emma
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and sociable, with a playful streak and a deep appreciation for music.
participant_2.background: I sometimes lie to my parents about where I'm going so I can hang out with my boyfriend. I am the youngest sibling in my family, I go running a lot, I play the trumpet, and I'd brag about my loyal friends who have stuck with me through thick and thin.

content.text: Hey! My name is Nick, what's your name?
Hey there, Nick! I'm Emma. It's nice to meet you.
Likewise. What are you up to today?
Not much, just hanging out. I'm really excited about this weekend though. My boyfriend and I are going to a music festival.
That sounds awesome! I love music festivals. What kind of music are you going to see?
We're going to see a lot of different artists, but I'm really excited to see The Killers. I've been a fan of theirs for years.
Awesome! I love The Killers too. They're great live.
I know, right? I can't wait to see them. What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I mostly listen to alternative and indie rock.
Cool! I like a lot of those genres too.
Do you have any other plans for the weekend?
Not really, just hanging out with my friends and family.
Yeah, it should be. What about you? What are you doing this weekend?
I'm not sure yet. I might go to the movies or something.
